com.udeyrishi.pipe

Class DefaultAndroidDispatcher

  • com.udeyrishi.pipe.DefaultAndroidDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PipelineDispatcher

    public class DefaultAndroidDispatcher
implements PipelineDispatcher

    A standard implementation of interface PipelineDispatcher that can be used by most apps. Executes all the jobs on Dispatchers.IO, and throws any internal errors on the Android UI thread.

    This is only meant as an example. In real production apps, you might want to replace DefaultAndroidDispatcher.onInternalPipeError with an implementation that logs the exceptions to some error reporting service.

    See Also:
    interface PipelineDispatcher, DefaultAndroidDispatcher.onInternalPipeError

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DefaultAndroidDispatcher INSTANCE
      A standard implementation of interface PipelineDispatcher that can be used by most apps. Executes all the jobs on Dispatchers.IO, and throws any internal errors on the Android UI thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineDispatcher getCoroutineDispatcher()
      The dispatcher to be used for launching job coroutines.
      void onInternalPipeError(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      A fallback handler that will be invoked if there are any unexpected exceptions in pipe. This does not include actual logical errors that can be safely thrown in the different steps. This is only for safely dealing with bugs in the pipe project.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.udeyrishi.pipe.PipelineDispatcher

        getCoroutineDispatcher, onInternalPipeError

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static DefaultAndroidDispatcher INSTANCE

        A standard implementation of interface PipelineDispatcher that can be used by most apps. Executes all the jobs on Dispatchers.IO, and throws any internal errors on the Android UI thread.

        This is only meant as an example. In real production apps, you might want to replace DefaultAndroidDispatcher.onInternalPipeError with an implementation that logs the exceptions to some error reporting service.

        See Also:
        interface PipelineDispatcher, DefaultAndroidDispatcher.onInternalPipeError

    • Method Detail

      • getCoroutineDispatcher

        public kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineDispatcher getCoroutineDispatcher()

        The dispatcher to be used for launching job coroutines.

      • onInternalPipeError

        public void onInternalPipeError(java.lang.Throwable throwable)

        A fallback handler that will be invoked if there are any unexpected exceptions in pipe. This does not include actual logical errors that can be safely thrown in the different steps. This is only for safely dealing with bugs in the pipe project.

        Will be invoked on a coroutine supplied by the PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher

        See Also:
        PipelineDispatcher.getCoroutineDispatcher
